title: Just wondering why increased prices of starting items.......
body:
Like {{item:1075}} gets to have +10 HP &+1 AD, and {{item:1056}}  gets to have 50% mana regeneration.......

.....but {{item:1054}}  got kicked in a nuts with **ONLY** increased price?

You could have at least give it the old Feast mastery (grants 2 HP & 1 mana on each units killed) or increase the damage reduction to 10 instead of 8, cz imo, all I see is you made Doran's Shield less & less tempting to build at start of every game.

replies.body:
Because mana pots were removed, so Doran's needed a better scaling form of MP5 and Doran's Blade has a new competitor, The Cull, which gives 1g per minion killed and at 100 minions, the passive is disabled and you get 300g bonus, so you can get 400g with it, practically it's cost. 

Doran's Shield is still a good item and always will be, really. While it's not the go-to item for all tanks, it is great when you have to go against an oppressive top laner like Quinn or Gnar.
